meaningMnemonic: If you want the <kanji>power</kanji> to stop a <kanji>bullet</kanji> you need to have just the right amount of <vocabulary>elasticity</vocabulary>. Bullets go right through rigid things, but if the material is strong and has the right amount of <vocabulary>flexibility</vocabulary>, the bullet will bounce right off!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
